jobRoles.title: Job Roles
jobRoles.searchPlaceholder: Search by job title or keywords...
jobRoles.noResultsMessage: No job roles match your criteria. Try adjusting your filters.
jobRoles.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this job role?
jobRoles.noJobsMessage: There are currently no job roles to display. Please check back later.
jobRoles.noMatchMessage: Try adjusting your search criteria or clearing some filters to see more results.
jobRoles.confirmDeleteJob: Are you sure you want to delete
jobRoles.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove this job role from the system.
jobRoles.positionClosed: This position is currently closed for applications.

jobApplication.title: Apply for Position
jobApplication.subtitle: Submit your application for
jobApplication.cvHint: Upload your CV in PDF, DOC, or DOCX format (max 5MB)
jobApplication.coverLetterHint: Optional - Upload your cover letter in PDF, DOC, or DOCX format (max 5MB)
jobApplication.whyInterested: Why are you interested in this position?
jobApplication.whyInterestedPlaceholder: Tell us what attracts you to this role and our company...
jobApplication.relevantExperiencePlaceholder: Describe your relevant experience and skills for this position...
jobApplication.additionalCommentsPlaceholder: Any additional information you'd like to share...
jobApplication.dataConsent: I consent to the processing of my personal data for this job application
jobApplication.marketingConsent: I would like to receive updates about future job opportunities
jobApplication.applicationSubmitted: Your application has been submitted successfully!
jobApplication.thankYou: Thank you for your interest. We will review your application and contact you soon.
jobApplication.applicationError: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again.

success.loginSuccess: Login successful! (This is a demo - no backend connection)

jobDescriptions.senior_software_engineer: Lead development of complex software solutions and mentor junior developers
jobDescriptions.product_manager: Drive product strategy and work with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional user experiences
jobDescriptions.data_scientist: Analyze complex datasets to derive insights and build predictive models
jobDescriptions.ux_designer: Create intuitive and engaging user experiences for digital products
jobDescriptions.devops_engineer: Maintain and improve infrastructure, CI/CD pipelines, and deployment processes
jobDescriptions.frontend_developer: Build responsive and interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies
jobDescriptions.qa_engineer: Ensure software quality through comprehensive testing strategies and automation
jobDescriptions.solutions_architect: Design enterprise-level technical solutions and guide implementation strategies
jobDescriptions.business_analyst: Bridge business requirements with technical solutions and process improvements
jobDescriptions.cybersecurity_specialist: Protect organizational assets through security monitoring and threat analysis

jobResponsibilities.senior_software_engineer: Design and implement scalable software systems|Code review|Technical leadership|Mentoring team members
jobResponsibilities.product_manager: Product roadmap planning|Stakeholder management|User research|Feature prioritization|Market analysis
jobResponsibilities.data_scientist: Data analysis|Machine learning model development|Statistical analysis|Data visualization|Reporting
jobResponsibilities.qa_engineer: Test planning|Automated testing|Manual testing|Bug reporting|Quality assurance processes
jobResponsibilities.cybersecurity_specialist: Security monitoring|Vulnerability assessment|Incident response|Security policy development
